Cryptography

ciphers

- symmetric encryption one session key (mas mabilis 100 to 1000 times faster than asymmetric)

-asymmetric encryption - two different session keys(public key and private key)

asymmetric cryptographic algo:

RSA - public-key cryptosystem

DSA - digital signature algo

ECDSA -  Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm

symmetric cryptographic algo

DES - 3des Data Encryption Standard

IDEA -International Data Encryption Algorithm

AES - advanced encryption standard

RC -  Rivest's Cipher or Ron’s Code 

Transport encryption - VPN, IT sec, https, ssl,wpa2,

end-to-end encryption - application layer, layer 7, pineprevent ng other party mabasa yung data natin sender and receiver has the power to read the data. example: [signal](https://signal.org/) app


CA - free  digital certificate 

digital certificate - issued to, when na certified, Public key

to check if the certificate is legitimate here is the link to check [link](https://crt.sh/)

title: Carrer opporunities in Cybersecurity
excerpt: a small note for the opportunities in getting in cybersecurity...
content:
Career opportunities 

- growing demand
- flexible work environment
- competitive salaries
- increased salary

attacking Roles

- vulnerability assessor
    - identifies weakness in app and systems
- penetration tester(Net/system)
    - ethical hacker specialized in network and system security
    - perform proof of concept testing for vulnerabilities
- Security researcher
    - discovers new vulnerabilities through research
- web app pen test
    - expert in securing web app and understanding in web tech
- red team operator
    - simulates adversarial tactics to test security systems.

Defensive side

Roles

Security Analyst

- monitors and responds to security events

threat hunter

- Ethical hacker specialized in network and system security

Malware / reverse engineering analyst

- analyst and breaking down malicious software and code

digital forensics/independent response 

- investigating and responding to computer incidents

cyber threat intelligence analyst 

- understanding and analyzing potential cyber threats

three pillars of cybersecurity 

people

process

technology


Vulnerability Scanning

Penetration testing - A simulated cyber attack against your computer system to check exploitable vulnerabilities. 

Penetration testing life cycle

1. recon - discover the target
2. enumeration or scanning - probing the defenses
3. gaining access - breaking in
4. maintaining access - Securing out foothold
5. covering tracks - erasing out footprint
6. reporting - documentation and reporting 

FUNDAMENTALS

- learn the operating systems
- learn basics of programming
- Learn networking
- learn security fundamentals
- Learn frameworks / methodology
- self directed learning combined with continuous practice.
- cloud and AI

repeater - manual http request manipulation

intruder - automated attacks

scanner - 

sequencer - analyzing session tokens

 sql injection

sql - structured query language

improper neutralization of special elements in sql command

sql inject dangerous

Data breach 

data loss

loss of accountability

Denial of service or DoS

full system compromise

mitigation strats

- prepared statements with parameterized queries
- input validation
- stored procedures(used safely)
- escaping user-supplied input

conclusion

SQLi is a critical vulnerability where attackers manipulate databases queries by injecting malicious SQL code through user input

title: The CIA TRIAD
excerpt: a small note for the CIA TRIAD...
content:
# Main Heading
Violation of Security Principle
## Subheading
CIA TRIAD- 

CIA triad

- confidentiality
    - info must only be avail to authorized parties like messages, personal data, healthcare records, Intellectual property.
    - Access control: Passwords, Two-factor authentication, Data Encryption.
- integrity
    - information must remain consistent, trustworthy and accurate examples are bank transact, document editing, online reviews, database management
    - access control: data validation, version control system
- availability
    - info must remain accessible to authorized parties even during failures examples: healthcare systems, online shopping website, cloud services
    - access control: Denial of service(DDoS)Protection
    - backups
    - load balancer
    
     Ransomware
    
    - multi-extortion ransomware
